info.title: ScoreBig
info.description: Search discount sports & events inventory that is always below box office price. Guaranteed. Our tickets are always authentic & valid for entry.

get.description: Get a list of valid categories.

parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: IDs of the category to restrict the search to.  Multiple category ids should be separated by commas.

parameters.name: deal_rating
parameters.description: Restrict search to certain deal ratings

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Only include events up to this date and time

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.  Default is 200

parameters.name: metro_region_id
parameters.description: IDs of the metro regions to restrict the search to.  Multiple metro region IDs should be separated by commas.

parameters.name: performer_id
parameters.description: IDs of the performers to restrict the search to (home games only)

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Free form text for a general search (event, city, venue, performer, etc)

parameters.name: secondary_performer_id
parameters.description: IDs of the performers to restrict the search to (away games only)

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Only include events after this date and time
